CONSENT_MISSING.description: No valid consent exists for the requested access purpose.

CONSENT_EXPIRED.description: Consent exists but is expired or revoked.

CUSTODY_CHAIN_BROKEN.description: Chain-of-custody record is incomplete, broken, or inconsistent.

PURPOSE_NOT_ALLOWED.description: Requested purpose is not permitted under consent/policy.

MINIMAL_DISCLOSURE_REQUIRED.description: Request attempts to access fields not necessary for the declared purpose.
